text: The Golden Louis is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithDean W. Duncan. Stories of Childhood: Evolving Portrayals in Books and FilmsTHE GOLDEN LOUIS and stars Anita Hendrie, Adele DeGarde, and Owen Moore. ==Actors== * Anita Hendrie as the mother or old woman * Adele DeGarde as child * Owen Moore as Good Samaritan, the donor of coin * Charles Inslee as main gambler * Herbert Yost as fellow gambler and reveler * Mack Sennett as fellow gambler and reveler * Arthur V. Johnson as fellow gambler * Linda Arvidson as reveler * George Gebhardt as reveler * Marion Leonard as reveler * Dorothy West as reveler * Florence Lawrence as onlooker * Wilfred Lucas as onlooker * Kate Bruce as onlooker * Gladys Egan as onlooker ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: The Golden Louis
